channel.title: Comments on: Keeping the cathedral stage thingy clear
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: peenboy50
item.dc:creator: peenboy50
item.description:
Now go and ring the bell downstairs with a silenced pistol.
The whole map can hear it.
item.content:encoded:
Now go and ring the bell downstairs with a silenced pistol.

The whole map can hear it.

item.title: By: Swimmingturtle247
item.dc:creator: Swimmingturtle247
item.description: btw, you can build some gnarly reinforcements on the stairs to prevent people from coming up. I do recommend.
item.content:encoded: btw, you can build some gnarly reinforcements on the stairs to prevent people from coming up. I do recommend.

item.title: By: finitogreedo
item.dc:creator: finitogreedo
item.description: Did you somehow tuck and roll when you jumped off?!
item.content:encoded: Did you somehow tuck and roll when you jumped off?!

item.title: By: jptechjunkie
item.dc:creator: jptechjunkie
item.description: Get the katana on this map and do some slice and dice!
item.content:encoded: Get the katana on this map and do some slice and dice!
